meanings.definition: A device used in construction to anchor structures or provide support.
meanings.sent1: The deadman helped secure the foundation of the building.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers used a deadman to hold the wall in place.
meanings.sent3: The deadman in the ground made sure the wall didn't fall over.
meanings.sent4: The deadman acted as a sturdy anchor for the structure.
meanings.sent5: The deadman was essential for keeping the building stable.

meanings.sent1: The deadman was laid to rest in the cemetery.
meanings.sent2: The family mourned the loss of their loved one, the deadman.
meanings.sent3: Even though he was a deadman, his memory lived on in their hearts.
meanings.sent4: The deadman's spirit seemed to linger in the old house.
meanings.sent5: The deadman's presence was felt by all who attended the funeral.
